src:
Milojevića iznenadio Proleter, drago mu je zbog jubileja
02 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Darko
Vladan Milojević je proslavio jubilej u pobedi Crvene zvezde nad Proleterom, a posle meča nije krio da su ga Novosađani iznenadili.
– Iznenađen sam igrom Proletera večeras. Na osnovu pripreme za utakmicu koju smo odradili nisam očekivao da će Proleter da bude ovoliko disciplinovan i dobro fizički pripremljen. Znajući da nemaju veliki fond igrača pokušali smo da izvršimo pritisak od prvog minuta. Plan nam je bio da ih uvedemo u jak ritam, međutim dosta su dobro odgovorili na našu ideju sa početka utakmice. Pokušavali smo u prvom poluvremenu da dođemo do gola, međutim nedostajala je realizacija. Iznenađen sam stanjem terena, koji je u jako lošem stanju. Nismo mogli našim načinom igre, kroz pas igru da dođemo do vođstva. Postigli smo gol i znali smo da će situacija posle njega biti znatno drugačija. Drugim golom smo mirno priveli utakmicu kraju – rekao je Milojević.
On je govorio i o utakmici protiv Totenhema koja Crvenu zvezdu očekuje u sredu, 6. novembra.

– Jako teška utakmica. Proleter je ekipa koja jako dobro trči. Imaju disciplinovanog trenera. Mi se sada okrećemo izazovima u Ligi šampiona. Kada igrate na svaka tri dana, jako je teško izdržati i psihički i fizički. Pokušavamo rotiranjem da odmorimo neke igrače kako bi bili spremni za ono što nas čeka u sredu. Očekuje nas izuzetno teška utakmica, međutim kao i uvek idemo na pobedu.

Pobeda protiv Proletera bila je jubilarna 100. za Milojevića od kada je trener Crvene zvezde.
– Izuzetno mi je drago što sam stigao do cifre od sto pobeda. Od samog početka fokusiran sam na svaku utakmicu i svaka pobeda je priča za sebe. Veoma je lepo znati da si postigao tako nešto u našem najvećem klubu. Isto tako nisu ovo samo moje pobede, fudbal je kolektivni sport. Ovo su pobede stručnog štaba i mojih igrača do kojih smo došli zajedno – zaključio je Vladan Milojević.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milojevic surprised by Proleter, pleased with his jubilee
02 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Darko
Vladan Milojevic celebrated Jubilee in the victory of Red Star over Proleter, and after the match he did not hide that the Novi Sad surprised him.
- I'm surprised to see Proleter play tonight. Based on the preparation for the game we did, I did not expect Proleter to be this disciplined and well prepared. Knowing that they do not have a large pool of players, we tried to exert pressure from the first minute. Our plan was to get them into a strong rhythm, however, they responded quite well to our idea from the beginning of the game. We were trying to get there in the first half, but there was a lack of realization. I was surprised by the condition of the terrain, which is in very poor condition. We couldn't get our way through the game of dog play to get the lead. We scored a goal and we knew the situation after it would be significantly different. With the second goal we calmly brought the game to an end - said Milojevic.
He also spoke about the game against Tottenham, which expects the Red Star on Wednesday, November 6th.

- A very tough game. Proleter is a team that runs really well. They have a disciplined coach. We are now facing the challenges of the Champions League. When you play every three days, it's really hard to endure both mentally and physically. We try rotating to rest some players so they are ready for what awaits us on Wednesday. We expect an extremely difficult game, however, as always, we are going to win.

The win against the Proleters was the 100th anniversary for Milojevic since he coached the Red Star.
- I'm very pleased to have reached the 100-win mark. From the very beginning, I am focused on every game and every win is a story unto itself. It is very nice to know that you have achieved something like this at our biggest club. Also, these are not just my victories, football is a collective sport. These are the victories of the professional staff and my players that we came to together - concluded Vladan Milojevic.
